On a hit, inflicts Silence, which prevents you from performing special attacks for ${onHitEffect0turns} of your turns, and inflicts a Slow that gives you +${onHitEffect1magnitude}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect1turns} of your turns.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

name: Eldritch Beam

name: Devouring Void
description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts ${onHitEffect0stacks} stacks of Voidburst. Upon reaching maximum stacks, you take damage equal to ${onHitEffect0percent}% of the enemy's base max hitpoints.
